page.title: 16Buxton:Health.
page.content: Buxton has ten general medical practitioners and three hospitals. Corbar Hospital specialises in maternity care, The Royal Devonshire Hospital deals with orthopaedic cases, a logical development of a Buxton tradition, and the Cottage Hospital deals with those general medical cases which are not of a complex or urgent nature. The nearest Casualty Unit is at Stockport Infirmary, and many other Buxton cases are dealt with at the Stepping Hill group of hospitals, Stockport. Stockport is nearly twenty miles away, and many people are concerned with the continuing threats to cloes Corbar Hall Maternity Unit and transfer all its facilities to Stockport. They point out the long and hazardous road journey from Buxton to Stockport, especially during the winter.
